name: Yoopica
tag_list: social-business, social-networking, resume, free, free-account, free-social-account
overview:
YooPica is a perfect place for individuals, professionals and businesses to market themselves. The website has a user-friendly site-search to help you easily find either a person or a company. Just select the needed country and classification and you are done.

As an Individual

1.Create free resumes online. With YooPica you can create a free account and access your resume from any computer which is quite convenient if you use different computers located different places. No matter where you are: at home, at work or on vacation – access your resume with ease.

2.Manage your resume. YooPica allows you do quick editing of your online resume, so you can easily adjust it in a flash of a moment when needed. Add more information, remove, change profile photo – do everything you need in few clicks.

3.Be professional. Having an online version of your resume is always a good plus, especially if you are applying for an IT related position. Be visible for those who are searching for a real pro like you.

As a Company or Business

1.Tell about your company. At YooPica you can create an excellent profile for your company with detailed information about it, services or products you offer. Become more visible to your target audience, expand your brand and become an authority (or strengthen it) with professionally looking profile.

2.Company branding by uploading a logo. All marketers know how it is important to have a strong brand. Yoopica is more than just another free business directory. It is the best place to get important connections and bring your company branding to the next level.

  1. Optimized profile. You can create an attractive and optimized profile at YooPica, so everybody can easily find your company both via organic search and website itself.
